answer:
In BC, influenza vaccines are generally available starting in October/November. Find the contact information for this pharmacy using our influenza clinic locator here. Contact them directly to ask when the flu shot will be available. 
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## In BC, influenza vaccines are generally available starting in October/November.

Find the contact information for this pharmacy using our influenza clinic locator here.
Contact them directly to ask when the flu shot will be available.
Immunization Nurse
question: Please let us know when the flu shot will be available at superstore Seymour pharmacy north Vancouver for fall 2018? Thank you , Regards,
